A BuildStatusBadge is a React component that allows you to include a real-time build status badge on your site.

Just paste in your status badge Markdown and you're ready to go.

It features automatic reloading (every 5 seconds by default) and uses query param cache busting to prevent client-side caching. This means your badge automatically updates on the page in real-time as the status changes—no clearing the cache or refreshing the page required.

See the props section for more options.","displayName":"BuildStatusBadge","methods":[],"props":{"href":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"The link for the badge. Will be overridden if a Markdown link is provided in `children`.","name":"href","required":false,"type":{"name":"string | undefined"}},"src":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"The source for the badge image. Will be overridden if a Markdown image is provided in `children`.","name":"src","required":false,"type":{"name":"string | undefined"}},"alt":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Alt text for the badge image. Default is `5000`.","name":"interval","required":false,"type":{"name":"number | undefined"}},"reloadDisabled":{"defaultValue":null,"description":"Set to true to disable automatic reloading and cache-busting. A BuildStatusBadge is a React component that allows you to include a real-time build status badge on your site.

Just paste in your status badge Markdown and you're ready to go.

It features automatic reloading (every 5 seconds by default) and uses query param cache busting to prevent client-side caching. This means your badge automatically updates on the page in real-time as the status changes—no clearing the cache or refreshing the page required.
